bill.title: Medical Use of Marijuana
bill.description: Updates the law relating to the medical use of marijuana by: (1) requiring the Department of Health to submit a report, including draft legislation, to the Legislature on recommendations to the list of authorized debilitating medical conditions; (2)requiring a separate registration at each principal place of business where an applicant recommends the medical use of marijuana; (3) clarifying definitions with respect to medical use of marijuana; (4) establishing a suspension period for those violating the medical marijuana program conditions; (5) limiting the amount of marijuana that can be possessed at a location; and (6) increasing the penalties for fraudulent misrepresentations about the medical use of marijuana. (HB1963 HD1)

history.action: (H) Referred to PBM/HLT, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBM/HLT on Thursday, 02-02-12 11:15AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on PBM recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Takai, Yamashita, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Souki; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Saiki, Takumi.

(H) The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Morikawa, Jordan; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) C. Lee, Mizuno, Wooley, Ching, Pine; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Hanohano; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti.
(H) Reported from PBM/HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 225-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) Wooley voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Hanohano voting no (1) and Representative(s) Belatti, C. Lee, M. Lee, Souki excused (4).
